main event: A luminous object was observed traveling at terrific speed over Ilha Itamaraca, Brazil.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of the full moon but smaller,It flared up occasionally during its flight,It was reported as moving northward,The object disappeared behind a cloud, causing the cloud to flare,The report includes comments that the object was likely a meteor.
sighted object: a brilliant object in the sky
witness description: third mate on duty aboard M/S Cometa
